setavatar.description: Sets bot avatar. Should be used with link or attachment.

blacklist.description: Adds user to blacklist. User will not be allowed to use any command on any server.

google.description: Searches Internet through Google and returns first found result. You can provide first argument to tell what result you need.

googleimg.description: Searches Internet through Google and returns first found image. You can provide first argument to tell what result you need.
